description: Try our easy to follow Eggplant Bruschetta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bruschetta & crostini,Eggplant,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Nov 2019,High fibre,Wheat free,Tomato,Dairy free
name: Eggplant Bruschetta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Combine half the coriander with garlic and 1/3 cup oil in a bowl. Season. Combine remaining coriander and oil with chilli, olives, tomato and pine nuts in a bowl.
Spray eggplant slices with oil and chargrill for 2 minutes on each side or until charred and softened. Place on serving plate and top with olive mixture. Drizzle over coriander oil and serve.
